tool.name: Simple linear regression
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This tool performs operations on columns: * it is possible to combine multiple columns (e.g. c1 * c2) * it is possible to transform one column using constants (e.g. c1 / 2)
you can use elementary operations
"+" addition "-" subtraction "*" multiplication "/" division
you can transform your data "log(c2)" "exp(c2)"
**Example**
input dataset ::
"a" "b" 1 0 2 5 5 6 10 2
Formula :
c1 + c2
Result ::
"result" 1 7 11 12
